name: neardevhub-trustees-dashboard-bos
description: Trustees dashboard built for NEAR BOS

scripts.bw:build:instance: npm run bw build instances/$npm_config_instance build/$npm_config_instance && mv build/$npm_config_instance/src/widget/* build/$npm_config_instance/src/ && rm -Rf build/$npm_config_instance/src/widget
scripts.build:sandbox: cd sandboxrpc && cargo build && npm run bw:build:test-bootstrap
scripts.dry-run:instances: cd ./build/$npm_config_instance && bos components diff $npm_config_instance network-config mainnet
scripts.deploy:devdao: npm run bw:build:devdao && cd ./build/treasury-devdao.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:devdao: npm run bw:build:devdao && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=treasury-devdao.near
scripts.deploy:treasury-factory: npm run bw:build:treasury-factory && cd ./build/treasury-factory.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:treasury-factory: npm run bw:build:treasury-factory && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=treasury-factory.near
scripts.deploy:testing: npm run bw:build:testing && cd ./build/treasury-testing.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:testing: npm run bw:build:testing && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=treasury-testing.near
scripts.deploy:infinex: npm run bw:build:infinex && cd ./build/treasury-infinex.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:infinex-testing: npm run bw:build:infinex-testing && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=treasury-testing-infinex.near
scripts.deploy:infinex-testing: npm run bw:build:infinex-testing && cd ./build/treasury-testing-infinex.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:infinex: npm run bw:build:infinex && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=treasury-infinex.near
scripts.deploy:templar: npm run bw:build:templar && cd ./build/treasury-templar.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:templar: npm run bw:build:templar && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=treasury-templar.near
scripts.deploy:test-bootstrap: npm run bw:build:test-bootstrap && cd ./build/test-bootstrap.treasury-factory.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:test-bootstrap: npm run bw:build:test-bootstrap && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=test-bootstrap.treasury-factory.near
scripts.deploy:bootstrap: npm run bw:build:bootstrap && cd ./build/bootstrap.treasury-factory.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:bootstrap: npm run bw:build:bootstrap && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=bootstrap.treasury-factory.near
scripts.deploy:test-widgets: npm run bw:build:test-widgets && cd ./build/test-widgets.treasury-factory.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:test-widgets: npm run bw:build:test-widgets && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=test-widgets.treasury-factory.near
scripts.deploy:widgets: npm run bw:build:widgets && cd ./build/widgets.treasury-factory.near && bos components deploy
scripts.dry-run:widgets: npm run bw:build:widgets && npm run dry-run:instances --instance=widgets.treasury-factory.near

author: treasury-devdao.near
